question: What is the theme of 7th edition of the Youth Festival 2018 in New Delhi?
explanation: The 7th edition of the Youth Festival has started with theme 'Let Love Live" at Central Park in New Delhi on February 22, 2018. The 6-day is organised by Sahitya Kala Parishad and the Department of Art, Culture and Languages, Delhi Government. The main purpose of this fest is to promote young performers. This year's festival is focused on "celebration of the freedom to love" and will host performances that drive home this message among the youngsters of Delhi.
